quests.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First stop, go to the south. After that, make an effort to travel east. Once you do that, try to head north. After that, move east. And then, travel north. Following that, take a trip west. With that done, make an attempt to head north. Okay, and then, pick up the Cat Calendar from the floor of the cubicle. That's it!

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Look at that placard! What does it say? It says Welcome to the study? Well that's cool.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a workshop. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a playroom. An ordinary one.

 You scan the room, seeing a recliner. The recliner is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a lounge. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see a box. Huh, weird.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in a shower.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookery. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a fridge.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_1], so there's that.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a freezer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a kitchenette. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a plate. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the plate.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the restroom. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You scan the room for a trunk, and you find a trunk.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a counter! [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the counter. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.

 You see a pan. The pan is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the pan you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You scan the room, seeing a bowl. The bowl is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bowl you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle.

 You can see a suitcase.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: box
infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: freezer
infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: suitcase
infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: Cat Calendar
infos.desc: The Cat Calendar appears to be to fit in here

infos.name: telephone
infos.desc: The telephone is clean.

infos.name: recliner
infos.desc: The recliner is undependable.

infos.name: plate
infos.desc: The plate is solidly built.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is wobbly.

infos.name: pan
infos.desc: The pan is durable.

infos.name: bowl
infos.desc: The bowl is durable.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, make an effort to venture south. Next, make an effort to move east. And then, travel north. And then, make an attempt to travel east. With that over with, head north. With that accomplished, go to the west. Then, make an effort to take a trip north. Then, retrieve the Cat Calendar from the floor of the cubicle. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
